Michel Platini, l'ancien Pr√©sident de l'UEFA, a une nouvelle fois parl√© du PSG. Sur les ondes de RTL, il a tenu √† justifier sa prise de position sur la politique exerc√©e par le club de la capitale.




Platini ne l√¢che pas Paris




Michel Platini+12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

L'ancien num√©ro 10 des Bleus ne l√¢che pas le PSG. Michel Platini, interrog√© sur France Info, a d√©plor√© l'importance de l'argent dans le monde du football et la mondialisation du secteur. Le PSG repr√©sente √† ses yeux le symbole de ces d√©rives : "Le pr√©sident est Qatari, le directeur sportif est Br√©silien, l'entra√Æneur est Alleamnd, il y a un Fran√ßais dans l'√©quipe. Pourquoi √ßa s'appelle le Paris Saint-Germain ? Parce qu'il y a 40 000 personnes, une grande population qui aime son club, d'accord. Mais bon, √ßa pourrait s'appeler Coca- Cola ou autre chose".
Agac√© par cette d√©claration, Leonardo avait r√©torqu√© la "jalousie" de Michel Platini. Mais celui-ci a r√©pondu sur les ondes de RTL aujourd'hui en doutant de la capacit√© de compr√©hension du Br√©silien : "Je pense que Leonardo, m√™me s'il parle bien fran√ßais, ne parle pas suffisamment bien le fran√ßais pour avoir compris ce que j'ai voulu dire".
Pour finir, il a assur√© que ce n'√©tait pas une charge contre le PSG. Il aurait pu prendre d'autres exemples qui ont le m√™me mode de fonctionnement que le club francilien.

text:
League 1
PSG: Platini gives a layer
The former number 10 of the Blues, Michel Platini, continues to play with the nerves of Paris leaders. After lamenting PSG's lack of identity, following an interview with France Info, the former UEFA president has justified his position.
07 Nov 2019, 21:00 by Mourad Bennis



Dijon - PSG: the notes of the Parisian playersAfter the meeting of this Friday evening against Dijon, discover the notes of the Parisian players.Icon Sport



Keylor Navas 3 / 10Icon Sport



Juan Bernat 4 / 10Icon Sport



Presnel Kimpembe 3 / 10Icon Sport



Abdou Diallo: 3 / 10Icon Sport



Colin Dagba 3.5 / 10Icon Sport



Marquinhos: 5 / 10Icon Sport



Idrissa Gueye 4,5 / 10Icon Sport



Leandro Paredes: 3 / 10Icon Sport



Kyllian Mbapp√©7 / 10Icon Sport



Mauro Icardi: 4 / 10Icon Sport



Angel Di Maria: 5 / 10Icon Sport

Dijon - PSG: the notes of the Parisian players!




Michel Platini, the former UEFA president, once again spoke about PSG. On RTL, he wanted to justify his position on the policy exercised by the club of the capital.




Platini does not give up Paris




Michel Platini + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The former number 10 of the Blues does not drop the PSG. Michel Platini, asked about France Info, deplored the importance of money in the world of football and the globalization of the sector. The PSG represents in his eyes the symbol of these drifts: "The president is Qatari, the sporting director is Brazilian, the coach is Alleamnd, there is a Frenchman on the team.Why it's called Paris Saint-Germain "Because there are 40,000 people, a large population that loves their club, all right, but it could be called Coca-Cola or something else."
Annoyed by this declaration, Leonardo had retorted the "jealousy" of Michel Platini. But he answered on RTL today, doubting the Brazilian's ability to understand: "I think Leonardo, although he speaks French well, does not speak French well enough to understand what I wanted to say".
Finally, he assured that it was not a charge against the PSG. He could have taken other examples that have the same mode of operation as the Ile-de-France club.
